title: "Colossal breakdown" in Florida shooting: Ryan
text:
"Colossal breakdown" in Florida shooting: Ryan 4:33pm GMT - 01:09 
U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan on Tuesday said Republicans lawmakers were focused on improving background checks of potential gun buyers, not a weapons ban that would deny law-abiding Americans their legal right to bear arms. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan on Tuesday said Republicans lawmakers were focused on improving background checks of potential gun buyers, not a weapons ban that would deny law-abiding Americans their legal right to bear arms.
